name: Retro Runners X2 - The Endless Run
name_original: Retro Runners X2 - The Endless Run
description:
The best free 8 bit infinite running game is BACK!
Retro Runners X2 is the ultimate endless run game!

Get ready for the challenge in this awesome race game with a nostalgic retro style 3D universe!
Get as far as you can, jumping, dodging obstacles and rivals, collecting coins and special items!

- More than 30 unlockable characters with unique SCENARIOS, skills and features!
- Compete for the online leaderboards!
- Unlock achievements!
- Avoid the paparazzi and the animals crossing the road!

Grab your running clothes, tie your sneakers and run to the track. Don't forget to drink water!

Want to talk to us? Send an email to: suport@countrysidegames.net
